short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you need to have more then the normal emojis in your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you want to have more emojis in your life but Github only supports the standard ones. Now you can define your own emojis and you can use the Github emoji syntax and it will auto fill in the emoji with image you have defined.
